column4: I just made my USB bootable with feisty (This how-to: http://xubuntublog.wordpress.com/2007/06/17/ubuntu-feisty-on-your-usb-drive-finally/) but, is it possible to 'install' ubuntu on a USB drive? SO i can run apache, mysql, and php ?
: I'm curious as to why you would like to run apache off a usb drive?
Im gonna take a holiday, And i want to test some PHP files etc ...
: I see!!  I'm no experience user here, I was simply curious :)
